_description: ‘In festo sanctorum apostolorum Philippi & Iacobi’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: SAint philip & Iacob dayes first in þe Moneth of may…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þai war cristend and come to blisso forto wirk ihesu vs wis
BLHar4196.Attributed Author: In festo sanctorum apostolorum Phylippi & Iacobi (rubric, f. 148rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 52-6.
